box.title: Taxa Type Counts
box.sql: select Name, ObjectCount from (select CollectionTypeID AS ObjectType, Count(CollectionObjectID) AS ObjectCount from collectionobject Group By CollectionTypeID) AS T2, collectiontype where T2.ObjectType = collectiontype. CollectionTypeID order by ObjectCount desc

box.title: CITES Permits Expiring
box.sql: select permit.PermitNumber, permit.PermitID, permit.IssuedDate,permit.StartDate, permit.EndDate,permit.RenewalDate,permit.Type From permit where ( lower(Type) like '%CITES%') and year(CURDATE()) = year(EndDate)
